Title: MyAjaxControlToolkit
Description: Some new ASP.NET AJAX controls based on AjaxControlToolkit.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Some new ASP.NET AJAX controls based on AjaxControlToolkit:
  • ButtonMenu: based on 'PopupExtender' permitts to show a popup on button's click (ButtonMenu page);
  • TimerExtender: permitts to reset the timer control associated and adds a client tick event (TimerExtender page);
  • SideBar: a sidebar with slide panel (pinnable) (SideBar page);
  • Splitter: a splitter control [in development] (Splitter page);

Prerequisites
  • AjaxControlToolkit: you can download lastest release here: http://www.codeplex.com/AtlasControlToolkit/

Please report any problem or suggestion using the Issue Tracker.
Thanks
